content: So in reading the STU2 draft ecqm guide I see the recommended names for the cql expressions, since they a just recommendations, is there a mechanism in the metadata to identify them? This is specifically a question for how are multiple Measure_Observations identified? Pardon my ignorance here, but my reading of the execution of a cv implies one one, yet I am encountering others talking about multiples, so the binding question for a execution engine came to mind since...

Hi @Jerry Goodnough , the Measure profiles and associated conformance requirements specify the expression naming conventions, and that the Measure metadata must refer to an Expression within the Library. Specifically, for continuous-variable measures: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/cqfmeasures/measure-conformance.html#conformance-requirement-13

@Bryn Rhodes Thanks... I see want got me now... I will write up a few suggestions that might help in the document and post them back here... I actually was about 90% complete on this and then they disappeared, argh.
